attributes.action: Force Haringey Council to Dismiss those involved in the Baby P case
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We do not want another whitewash:
A short, tragic life

2006
March 1 is born.

May 2 Makes 1st visit to GP, suffering from vomiting.

October 13 Taken to GP with bruising. Mother claims he fell down stairs.

Nov/Dec Boyfriend moves into family home.

December 11 Is referred to social services after head injury.

December 12 Haringey social services meeting considers baby's case.

December 15 Police investigation starts.

December 19 Mother arrested for assault and bailed.

December 22  placed on child protection register. 

2007

January 26  Back with mother 

February 22 Social worker makes first visit to the family's new house. 

April 9 Mother takes  to hospital with large swelling and bruising on the left side of his head. 

June 1 , now 15 months old, is visited unannounced by social worker who notices bruising.

June 5 Mother is arrested for a second time and questioned by police.

June 29 Jason Owen moves into the house. 

July 30 2007 Social worker makes last visit to see .

July 31 CPS decide there's insufficient evidence to charge mother .

August 1  taken to hospital. Doctor allegedly fails to spot broken spine and ribs. 

August 3  taken to hospital and pronounced dead.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
